AI_Sales_Agent

AGENT BROSKI
AI VOICE & TEXT.

The CRM is the brain, but Agent Broski is the voice. Our AI Sales Agent handles the calls and texts, qualifying leads in real time and syncing every word to your CRM. Never miss a lead again.

AI Voice Calls

Human grade phone conversations that qualify leads 24/7.

Smart Text Replies

Instant SMS responses that keep conversations moving forward.

CRM Integration

Every call and text is recorded and synced to the contact record.
